remarks: The partial isomorphism B for a lattice ` K ` .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)
statement:
dibval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dibval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibval.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibval.o $e |- .0. = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
dibval.j $e |- J = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibfval $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> I = ( x e. dom J |-> ( ( J ` x ) X. { .0. } ) ) ) $.
$d J x $.
$d K f x $.
$d W f x $.
